gen:link.msg:message: Reported value of `LiabilitiesNoncurrent` at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of `LiabilitiesNoncurrent` at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, `LiabilitiesNoncurrentMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_LiabilitiesNoncurrentEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_LiabilitiesNoncurrentEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_LiabilitiesNoncurrentStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_LiabilitiesNoncurrentStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_LiabilitiesNoncurrentMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_LiabilitiesNoncurrentMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`LiabilitiesNoncurrentMovement` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_LiabilitiesNoncurrentMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_LiabilitiesNoncurrentMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfLiabilitiesNoncurrentMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfLiabilitiesNoncurrentMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfLiabilitiesNoncurrentMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfLiabilitiesNoncurrentMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`LiabilitiesNoncurrent` SHOULD be equal to + `LiabilitiesNoncurrentMaturityLessThanOneYear` + `LiabilitiesNoncurrentMaturityExceedingOneYearWithinFiveYears` + `LiabilitiesMaturityExceedingFiveYears`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST103Variables1E1_Filter00LiabilitiesNoncurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST103Variables1E1_Filter00LiabilitiesNoncurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST103Variables1E1_Filter01LiabilitiesNoncurrentMaturityLessThanOneYear')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST103Variables1E1_Filter01LiabilitiesNoncurrentMaturityLessThanOneYear return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST103Variables1E1_Filter02LiabilitiesNoncurrentMaturityExceedingOneYearWithinFiveYears')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST103Variables1E1_Filter02LiabilitiesNoncurrentMaturityExceedingOneYearWithinFiveYears return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST103Variables1E1_Filter03LiabilitiesMaturityExceedingFiveYears')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST103Variables1E1_Filter03LiabilitiesMaturityExceedingFiveYears return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`LiabilitiesNoncurrent` reported with `LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis` and `AccrualsAndDeferredIncomeMember` SHOULD be equal to `AccrualsAndDeferredIncomeNoncurrent` without `LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis` and AccrualsAndDeferredIncomeMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit9_Set02LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit9_Set02LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit9_Set01LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit9_Set01LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`LiabilitiesNoncurrent` reported with `LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis` and `ConvertibleBorrowingsNoncurrentMember` SHOULD be equal to `ConvertibleBorrowingsNoncurrent` without `LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis` and ConvertibleBorrowingsNoncurrentMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit10_Set02LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit10_Set02LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit10_Set01LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit10_Set01LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`LiabilitiesNoncurrent` reported with `LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis` and `DebenturesOtherPrivateLoansNoncurrentMember` SHOULD be equal to `DebenturesOtherPrivateLoansNoncurrent` without `LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis` and DebenturesOtherPrivateLoansNoncurrentMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit11_Set02LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit11_Set02LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit11_Set01LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit11_Set01LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`LiabilitiesNoncurrent` reported with `LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis` and `LiabilitiesNoncurrentMember` SHOULD be equal to `LiabilitiesNoncurrent` without `LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis` and LiabilitiesNoncurrentMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set02LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set02LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set01LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set01LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`LiabilitiesNoncurrent` reported with `LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis` and `NegativeGoodwillMember` SHOULD be equal to `NegativeGoodwill` without `LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis` and NegativeGoodwillMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit7_Set02LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit7_Set02LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit7_Set01LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit7_Set01LiabilitiesNoncurrentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
